MAHOUT-1201 Fix mahout jobs that do do not pass user supplied conf
Some (KMeansDriver, MeanShiftCanopyDriver, FuzzyKMeansDriver, CanopyDriver, ClusterClassificationDriver, PFPGrowth, DistributedConjugateGradientSolver, InformationGain and InformationGainRatio) did not pass user supplied configuration object to sub jobs
